story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Archi Construction & Veranda was founded in 2009 with a clear mission: to deliver high-quality outdoor constructions that enrich the lives of our customers.

What started as a small family business has grown into a renowned specialist in bioclimatic pergolas, aluminium verandas and carports. With over 500 successful projects in Belgium and neighbouring countries, we have built a solid reputation.
Our strength lies in the combination of Belgian craftsmanship, premium materials and personal service. Every project is executed with the same dedication and attention to detail, regardless of size.
